permission.name: tramite.lectura
permission.condition: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.seguridad.db.Permiso p WHERE p.tramite = self AND p.perfil = 'CREADOR' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.sistemaeducativo.db.CentroUsuario cu WHERE cu.usuario = ? AND cu.tipoUsuario = p.tipoUsuario AND cu.centro.code = '46019660' AND ( p.cargo IS NULL OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cu.cargos c WHERE c = p.cargo ) ) ) )

permission.name: expendiente.lecturaAdministrador
permission.condition: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.sistemaeducativo.db.CentroUsuario cu WHERE cu.usuario = ? AND cu.centro.code = '46019660' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cu.cargos cargo WHERE cargo.code = 'admin' ) )

permission.name: expediente.lecturaAmbitoCreadorIndividual
permission.condition: self.tipoExpediente.ambitoCreador = 'INDIVIDUAL' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.sistemaeducativo.db.CentroUsuario cu WHERE cu.usuario = ? AND cu.centro.code = '46019660' AND self.valoresAmbitoCreador.usuario = cu.usuario )

permission.name: expediente.lecturaAmbitoCreadorCentro
permission.condition: self.tipoExpediente.ambitoCreador = 'CENTRO' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.sistemaeducativo.db.CentroUsuario cu WHERE cu.usuario = ? AND cu.centro.code = '46019660' AND self.valoresAmbitoCreador.centro = cu.centro )

permission.name: expediente.lecturaAmbitoCreadorDepartamento
permission.condition: self.tipoExpediente.ambitoCreador = 'DEPARTAMENTO' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM com.educaflow.apps.sistemaeducativo.db.CentroUsuario cu WHERE cu.usuario = ? AND cu.centro.code = '46019660' AND self.valoresAmbitoCreador.centro = cu.centro AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cu.departamentos departamento WHERE departamento = self.valoresAmbitoCreador.departamento ) )
